pageContext.claim: “That was not good, but Biden wants to... to cut our military budget, and he wants to cut it right to the bone.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden has said he does not foresee major cuts to the defense budget. He has said he plans to reprioritize spending from “legacy systems that won't be relevant” to “smart investments in technologies and innovations — including in cyber, space, unmanned systems and artificial intelligence.”
